cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)
project(third_party)

#################
# Find packages #
#################

find_package(catkin REQUIRED)


#################################
# catkin specific configuration #
#################################

catkin_package(CATKIN_DEPENDS)

#########
# Build #
#########

include_directories(
        ${catkin_INCLUDE_DIRS})

link_libraries(
        ${catkin_LIBRARIES})
